name: Personal Data Manager
author: EasyToolbox

sections.description:
This Pluign is under construction. please use it after release of version 1.0

Access your personal data anytime you want. This plygins helps you to keep track of your daily expance and income records, daily tasks, repetative task or expanse etc.

Using this “Personal Data Manager” plugin user can track and manage your income, expanse and daily tasks.

Features

  • Income tracking
  • Expanse tracking
  • Daily, monthly and yearly reporting
  • Repetative income & expanse manage
  • Task manage
  • more will comming soon…

This Pluign is under construction. please use it after release of version 1.0

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload et-personal-data-manager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Installation process completed.
  4. Now Go to Personal Data Manager menu, here you can do all the tracking and managements.
